name: Prickly Paradise
description:
When you get there, you feel like you're in paradise. Until you reach the first spike!

This is a Platformer game with one life!

To find a match to the theme, you need to complete the game!

Collect 30 phones to pass

Management:

A and D - moving

Space and W - jump

Left Shift - dash

Made for #12 Mini Game Gam
